post.content:
Processor --> Agents --> BOs
CP logic if command is login if sec.isValidLogin() return teller.findAccount(client id) else issueError("invalid login, try again");
General function of Agents 1. communicative event-handling check other component status and exchange info between peers 2. pro-active pub-sub broad casting current status to subscriber (ex, reporting) self diagnosis for health 3. passive request-response when receving request, do action
4. pluggable self component sample of agents : securityagent, telleragent
same thing in real world - RRSP broker between client and mutual fund company.
